analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0x53437f622bf47e758c301d0e1d2649fd42a8baa6.sol:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/22/0x53437f622bf47e758c301d0e1d2649fd42a8baa6.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/22/0x53437f622bf47e758c301d0e1d2649fd42a8baa6.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
